channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-9298] ns checker runs too frequently; too much mention in master logs
item.description:
Make ns checker run every 5 minutes instead of every 30 seconds.

Also fix a bit more logging. Can make the asyncprocess messages shorter by removing redundnate info like tablename.

Did pass removing 'region' and 'server' and META qualifiers where they are not needed.
item.summary: ns checker runs too frequently; too much mention in master logs

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/6840//console

This message is automatically generated.
Couldn't see the patch...

+1 to the NS change.

very minor nit:

  • " - sleeping " + backOffTime + " ms.");
    + " ops , resubmitting " + toReplay.size() + ", " + location + ", last exception was: " +
    + throwable.getMessage() + ", sleeping " + backOffTime + "ms");
    Could it end with old format: " ms." Helps while grepping. Thanks.

Because you grep ' ms' instead of 'ms' of [0-9]*ms ? I made it no-space ms because thats how we usually do ms in logs.

Thanks for the +1
Committed to trunk and 0.95. Thanks for review H.

This issue was closed as part of a bulk closing operation on 2015-11-20. All issues that have been resolved and where all fixVersions have been released have been closed (following discussions on the mailing list).
